info.title: Sentity text analytics
info.description: Using Sentity API you can analyze sentiments of short messages or comments, determine their language and parts of speech of individual words in a sentence.

get.description: Detect language of text sent in url. If a language cannot be detected, "unknown" string will be returned as language code and "unknown" string as language name.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Some text that you'd like to extract language information from.

post.description: Detect language of text sent as JSON array. Every item will be processed separately and returned in exactly the same order it was sent. If a language cannot be detected, "unknown" string will be returned as language code and "unknown" string as language name.
Returns all words of text with corresponding POST tags.
Get sentiments of text sent in JSON array. Every item will be processed separately and returned in exactly the same order it was sent.
